name: ROOMS Scratch Edition
description:
--Keybinds below.--

Welcome to the rooms scratch version.

You journey alone through the rooms but whatever you do don't let it catch you.

at the bottom left theres the duration of the flashlight. you get more duration once you touch a battery and press E. at the top left theres the Stamina at the top right u can see the current room you are in.

Keybinds: 

Arrow keys - Move.

Hold space and press any arrow key - Sprint.

F - Enter Locker.

Hold Space while in locker - Exit locker.

Touch a battery and press e to grab it.

Credits go to nicorocks5555 for creating rooms, roblox creator marketplace for (most) sounds!
